programme.title: Space Channel News Update | Deep Space Technologies
programme.desc: Back in 2006, to minimize competition, Boeing and North Grumman decided to form a joint venture for a period of time, realizing that they would no longer be bidding against each other for giant NASA contracts. This plan worked swimmingly until newcomers SpaceX arrived on the scene, and there was competition again. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Overview Special
programme.desc: Astronauts, authors, industry experts offer opinions on the potential of what author Frank White describes as the Overview Effect. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel Movies : Queen of Blood
programme.desc: In the year 1990 An alien species makes contact with Earth through radio transmission. An alien ship crash lands on Mars, and a rescue team is sent from Earth. Eventually a surviving female is located and brought on-board the Earth ship. Trouble. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Kronos
programme.desc: Aliens send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth and absorb all energy it comes in contact with. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie : Plan 9 From Outer Space
programme.desc: Aliens hatch a terrible plan to resurrect the dead of the Earth, to do their bidding. But that's not as bad as the actual script in this movie. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: His surviving family have said how great it is to finally have Freddie immortalized in rock, and really appreciate the sediment. Duration: 60

programme.title: Space Channel Academy
programme.desc: Civilization ending event, or wild conspiracy? We break it down. Duration: 290

programme.title: Latest News - Tide in Space
programme.desc: SpaceX sent Tide detergent to astronauts on the ISS so they can figure out how to do laundry for long-haul trips to Mars. Astronauts on the ISS received a shipment of items onboard a SpaceX spacecraft on Wednesday. The shipment included specially-developed laundry detergent made by Tide. Duration: 224

programme.title: Health Report - NASA Food Upgrade
programme.desc: In coordination with the Canadian Space Agency, NASA is asking the public to help create sustainable food production technology that can be done with few resources and minimal waste. Duration: 194

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: the Original Flash Gordon S1E7 and E8
programme.desc: Flash, Barin, Thun and Zarkov create an explosion in the atomic furnaces. Then....Dr. Zarkov saves the Hawkmen's city in the sky from falling, earning Flash and his friends King Vultan's gratitude. Ming insists that Flash fight a tournament of death against a masked opponent, revealed to be Barin, and then against a vicious orangopoid. Duration: 3600
